alert.note: Alert for Fairfield; Fayette; Franklin; Highland; Madison; Pickaway; Ross (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 07 at 5:38AM EST by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF SOUTHEASTERN FRANKLIN, WESTERN FAIRFIELD, FAYETTE, PICKAWAY, NORTHEASTERN HIGHLAND, SOUTHEASTERN MADISON AND NORTHWESTERN ROSS COUNTIES THROUGH 615 AM EST... At 538 AM EST, a strong thunderstorm was located near Washington Court House, moving east at 65 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and very heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Visibility will be poor and hydroplaning is possible. Locations impacted include... Columbus, Grove City, Washington Court House, Circleville, Greenfield, Canal Winchester, Groveport, Ashville, Mount Sterling, South Bloomfield, Leesburg, Jeffersonville, Kingston, Williamsport, Bloomingburg, New Holland, Logan Elm Village, Obetz, Staunton and Commercial Point. This includes I-71 in Ohio between mile markers 69 and 98. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a sturdy building. Motorists should slow down and use extra caution. To report hazardous weather conditions, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.

area.areaDesc: Fairfield; Fayette; Franklin; Highland; Madison; Pickaway; Ross
